full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Dental X Ray Equipment and Software

### Solicitation Information

* Reference Number: WS3750959165-Doc3819315928
* Amendment Number: 1
* Solicitation Number: WS3750959165
* Publication Date: 2023-01-09
* Closing Date: 2023-01-25 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-01-09

### Contract Information

* Duration: 
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-02-06
	+ Expected Contract End Date: 2023-03-31
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Method of Procurement: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

### Requisites

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 21201-231083A dated 2022-11-22. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation.

A Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requirement mandates the replacement and upgrading of dental X-ray software and some equipment. Bids must be submitted with all required supporting documentation. An amendment to the closing time has been made. Bidders must disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline and Buyandsell posting closing time, and submit their required documentation and bid on January 25, 2023 by 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.

Bidders should consult the solicitation documents at the URL below for more details.

* [Ariba Discovery Website](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15079717?extsite=MTUwNzk3MTdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
## Trade Agreements
Bidders should be aware of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

## Regions of Delivery
The region of delivery includes the following:

* Nova Scotia
* New Brunswick
